mapper.select: select * from wtm_member_invited_record r WHERE r.memberId=#{memberId};

select m.id memberId,m.memberName memberName,s.memberScore,FROM_UNIXTIME(r.createTime) invitedTime from wtm_member m LEFT JOIN wtm_member_invited_record r ON r.memberId=m.id LEFT JOIN wtm_member_score s ON s.memberId=m.id WHERE r.parentId=#{parentID};

SELECT m.id memberId, m.memberName memberName, s.memberScore, FROM_UNIXTIME(r.createTime) invitedTime, his.totalScore, his.sharedCount, his.invitedScore FROM (SELECT sum(history.count) totalScore, history.memberId memberId, CASE task.id WHEN 2 OR 4 THEN task.count END AS sharedCount, CASE task.id WHEN 3 THEN task.count END AS invitedScore FROM wtm_member_task_history history LEFT JOIN wtm_member_task task ON task.id = history.taskId WHERE history.memberId =#{memberId} AND task.id IN (2, 3, 4) GROUP BY history.memberId) his LEFT JOIN wtm_member_invited_record r ON r.parentId = his.memberId LEFT JOIN wtm_member m ON m.id = r.memberId LEFT JOIN wtm_member_score s ON s.memberId = m.id
